layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x53
  LayoutBlockFlow {test} at (0,0) size 800x53
    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,16) size 800x21
      LayoutBlockFlow {input} at (4,3) size 13x13 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
      LayoutText {#text} at (20,1) size 4x19
        text run at (20,1) width 4: " "
      LayoutInline {span} at (0,0) size 365x19 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (24,1) size 365x19
          text run at (24,1) width 365: "Everything in this paragraph should have a green background"
